name: Escape from Grustovia
description:
You are an ordinary guy living amidst the apartment buildings of the country of Grustovia, but now the moment has come that will determine how fast you can run. You've received a draft notice, and an incredible adventure begins, one that will be remembered for a lifetime if you're not quick enough. You need to run or hide. For planned repositioning, you have several unique paths available: escape through the garages and attempt to cross the border or seek refuge in the metro catacombs. Which mode of transportation will be most suitable for the terrible roads of Grustovia, which border to cross is better, where to hide in the metro, and much more awaits you in the game "Escape from Grustovia"

Game Features:


  • You can steal a tractor
  • Numerous diverse escape routes
  • Multiple endings
  • Underground apartments and a camouflaged gold reserve
